ComicInfo.Summary:
A mythic origin story you never expected to see! This winter, the Sword will be drawn for the first time ever, courtesy of writer/artist/Locke & Key co-creator Gabriel Rodriguez in a five-issue miniseries adventure of epic proportions! A young woman will become the first wielder of the most famous sacred weapon of all time to champion for her world’s survival, inspiring a legion of heroes to join her struggle against a merciless alien force. The line between science fiction and magic might get fuzzy, but the line between heroes and villains will be drawn in blood.
ContentsPrelude: CastawaysChildren of the Mountain ForestsThe Elder GuardiansOn the RoadGathering AdventurersSlavers CaravanBlack Star TemplarsThe Guardian of the Sacred Lake*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Gabriel Rodriguez | 1-2 | B | Cover B | Gabriel Rodriguez & Lovern Kindzierski | 3 | RI-A | Retailer Incentive Cover A | Gabriel Rodriguez & Lovern Kindzierski | 4 | RI-B | Retailer Incentive Cover B | Gabriel Rodriguez | 5 | RE | Yesteryear Comics Exclusive Variant Cover | Miguel Mercado | 6 | RE | Forbidden Planet/Jetpack Exclusive Variant Cover | Gabriel Rodriguez & Lovern Kindzierski | 7 | RE | Forbidden Planet/Jetpack Exclusive Variant Cover | Gabriel Rodriguez | 8 |
